title: A Cherished Haven
description: After years of being away, Josephine Namin returns to the only place she has ever thought of as home to escape an abusive ex-boyfriend. An unexpected discovery leads her to wonder if she will ever be able to move beyond past, unhealthy relationships or if it will be the strings to those relationships that will ultimately keep her from having what she wants the most.
author: Katie S. Cormier
